data.eml:eml: An introduction to the systematics of Akodon orophilus Osgood, 1913 (Rodentia: Cricetidae) with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiménez, Carlos F., Pacheco, Víctor, Vivas, Dan (2013): An introduction to the systematics of Akodon orophilus Osgood, 1913 (Rodentia: Cricetidae) with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 3669 (3): 223-242, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3669.3.2
